resources:
Need to restart the application to take effect
0
%02d:%02d Cancel Come back later delete do not show again Sure no Yes continue Confirm the changes help understood quit hide recover jump over Retry application Reboot Restore selected please confirm download Waiting for a timeout, please make sure your Root Manager is running in the background and try again! 

Please make sure that you have not prevented the "Authorization Manager (SuperSu, Magisk Manager, etc.)" from starting automatically, and allow background pop-up windows, display floating windows and other permissions. If the authorization dialog box does not pop up, it is recommended to restart the phone and try again! 

Sorry, no ROOT permission has been obtained Without ROOT permission, many special functions will be lost. 
If you missed the authorization prompt, or did not see the pop-up window, please find your ROOT manager and manually set to allow Scene to use ROOT permissions~ Install Busybox? It seems that busybox is not installed on your phone, which will make Scene unusable. Do you want to install it now (requires system modification)?
You can also try Scene, I think it's not bad, download link:
 http://vtools.omarea.com/ -->
Scene5 Alpha Scene5 Scene-quick switching mode
Export Boot Back up the Boot currently in use as img, copy it to /sdcard/boot.img Flash into Boot Choose to flash boot.img
Export Recovery Backup the currently used export Recovery as img, copy it to /sdcard/recovery.img Flash into Recovery Choose to flash recovery.img
Export DTBO partition Export DTBO partition as img image and copy to /sdcard/dtbo.img Flash into DTBO mirror Choose to flash into dtbo.img
Export Persist partition Export the Persist partition as an img image and copy it to /sdcard/persist.img Flash into Persist image Choose to flash into persist.img
Overwrite files? /sdcard/%s.img already exists, do you want to overwrite the existing file? 
 Insufficient storage space, please reserve at least 200M free space!
Blacklist settings System scene Ignore the state of charge In the charging state, the screen rest action is delayed until the charging is completed.
SeLinux tolerance mode Switch SELinux to permissive mode (some software is called [Close Selinux]), the state of SeLinux has no effect on Scene, and enabling permissive mode may crash and restart! Theme color Debug window Displays the log of Scene's judgment of the foreground application process Reminder icon Display the function description prompt (question mark) icon next to the function item Exit automatically when abnormal Automatically end the process when there is an abnormality in the running process to avoid stuck white screen Error log When the Scene has an error and crashes back, click the button below to grab the log through logcat and send it to the developer to solve the problem Black notice background When the system is in night mode, the permanent notification of Scene will be displayed as a black background (No need to turn on this option under normal circumstances)
Overview Donate rewards Scene mode Application scenarios System scene Automatic click Performance configuration Application bias Power consumption statistics View power consumption (current) data recorded during application use CPU control Miscellaneous settings Additional features Application management SWAP settings Charge control Charge statistics Power consumption statistics Custom command Process management Magisk module Frame rate recording Add-on module Gesture navigation Application settings Global Settings Screen filter Backup and restore Bragging Feedback exchange Share app MIUI temperature control
system
Ancillary service is activated Click here to activate ancillary services Scene enhancement service
You need to activate this service in order to use the following functions:

1. Dynamic response (automatically adjust performance according to the foreground application).

2. Automatic behavior (when switching the network when switching the screen or switching applications Recycling process).

3. Automatic installation (automatically click next when installing third-party applications) Please activate the [Scene Auxiliary Service] option in the system settings Auxiliary services are not activated, click here to activate You need to activate this service to adjust performance by application, automatically switch GPS, and record power consumption speed.
Battery: If you need to use the "charging speed regulation" and "charging protection" functions, be sure to keep Scene running in the background! Actual current limit: USB-PD fast charge The phone will determine whether to activate USB-PD charging based on the compatibility status, without manual setting. Manual switching will cause the charging speed to be slow, so manual modification is not allowed! Current status: Has entered PD fast charge mode Did not enter PD fast charge mode OK, if you want this function to be turned on automatically after the phone restarts, please allow Scene to start automatically after booting! The charging acceleration service has been disabled. You may need to restart your phone to restore the default settings! unknown $bms/uevent $usb/uevent %02d:%02d Dynamic charging speed Adjust to slow charging when it is nearly full

and actively reduce the charging speed at night Wake up time Falling asleep time Manual control No charging Resume charging Battery usage record View records Delete Record Charging protection Stop charging after reaching the specified power level

Note: Long-term use may cause the power display to be inaccurate Power limit value (%) Charging speed Stop charging when reaching %d%%, and recover below %d%% Adjust the charging speed limit. The crazy increase is meaningless, because it will not achieve the actual effect, please adjust the value within the effective range

Note: The upper limit value is for reference only, please refer to the actual charging speed! The charging function is disabled! The charging function has been restored! Data camouflage battery power Full capacity Stepped charging The system adjusts the upper limit of the charging speed in stages according to the power level to help protect the battery life

It is generally recommended to keep the default setting Purpose of charging speed
reduce speed
Speed up charging
Charge to death
Scene will perform speed changes at different times according to your choice. The specific differences are as follows.

Reduce speed: reset the charging speed only when the charger is connected and the battery percentage changes.
Accelerate charging: the battery status changes, and the charger is connected Reset the charging speed at the time
Charge to the dead: Based on the logic of [Charge Acceleration], the charging speed is automatically reset every second
Current voltage: Current current: Current Temperature: Not charging charging be filled Not charging Status unknown 
Approximately charge %smAh Current unit calibration Current charging speed, divided by: shown as: Charging should be displayed as a positive number, and discharging should be displayed as a negative number
Select configuration source Classic configuration The presets provided by Scene, each mode is distinct Performance-oriented The presets provided by Scene pay more attention to performance release as a whole Automatically switch modes according to changes in the foreground application Dynamic Response Excellent performance Remove the game frequency limit/frame lock and high temperature reminder, please pay attention to protect your device!
Global default (bright screen state) Applications that do not set the scheduling mode separately will use this mode by default. 

If you need to individually set the mode for an application, please click [App Policy] at the bottom of the current interface Switch on standby After the phone enters the standby state, it will switch to the selected mode After the foreground application changes, delay 5s before performing the scheduling mode switch Delayed switching Strict mode If this option is not turned on, Scene will only execute the scheduling profile when it needs to change gears. For example, when switching between multiple applications set to [Power Saving Mode], the scheduling profile will only be executed once. 

In strict mode, Scene will execute the scheduling configuration file every time the foreground application changes, and notify the application (package name) that is switched to the foreground to run. Scheduling configuration authors can use this feature to individually design scheduling parameters for different applications, and are no longer limited by the limitation of only four gears. 

When the Snapdragon 855, 865, 888 models use the [Classic Configuration] [Performance Focus] configuration source, you can turn on the strict mode to experience exclusive optimization in the following applications:
Yuanshen (official server, B server, Xiaomi server)
Xianyu, Taobao, Jingdong, Tmall, Baidu Post Bar
Twin Vision
Bilibili, Douyin

Other processor models, unless you are using an external configuration source (and the configuration author It has been indicated that this feature is supported), otherwise there is no need to turn on this option! Application strategy Separate scheduling policies for each application You cannot enable this function before installing a valid scheduling configuration~ You have installed the scheduling configuration provided by other authors (located in /data/powercfg.sh), and you must delete it first to change the configuration source. Do you want to delete it now? 

* It is recommended to restart the phone once after deleting You are using the scheduling configuration provided by other authors~ Scene's own scheduling configuration has not been adapted to the current SOC~ You have not turned on [Dynamic Response], Scene cannot adjust the performance of the device according to changes in the foreground application! Uperf scheduling only provides three modes of [stuck/balanced/charged electricity], which correspond to Scene's [power saving/balanced/performance] respectively. 
When you select [Extreme Speed] mode in Scene, the actual effect is [Charge], which is the same as selecting [Performance] mode
Please do not enter special symbols for model information! 
It is compatible with the model code of the [application variable] module. After copying, reopen this window and you can use it! After modification, you can click "Restore" -> "Confirm" to restore the model before modification. Uninstalling Scene will result in the loss of the backup model information. Please be sure to restore before uninstalling! 

Alternatively, you can also restore the model information by flashing the complete ROM again! 

Do not use this function to modify the model when using DualBootPatcher multi-system software! ! ! Preset template Quick start Application bias Scene-Online
Temporarily unavailable Power saving mode Performance configuration-power saving Balanced mode Performance configuration-balance Performance mode Performance configuration-performance Speed mode Performance configuration-speed This function does not support your device temporarily!
Immersive experience Automatically hide the status bar and navigation bar Reduce Flyme6 blur Disable the real-time blur effect of the Flyme6 pull-down notification center to reduce the lag in the pull-down notification center of Meizu low-end devices during games or video playback. It may also save power and need to be restarted. MIUI9 go to the notification center to search Hide the search box of the MIUI9 system drop-down notification center by default, and it will take effect after restarting DPI, resolution modification Customizing the phone’s DPI or resolution may cause the device to fail to start normally, or UI errors Model modification By changing the camouflage model of build.prop, some phones may fail to boot or have bugs Modify the MAC address (Scheme 1) Customize the MAC address of the mobile phone WIFI network card, only supports some devices Modify the MAC address (Scheme 2) Customize the MAC address of the mobile phone WIFI network card, only supports some devices, more suitable for Android Q Force dex2oat to compile Compile the application with dex2oat to reduce the CPU and RAM usage at runtime. The compilation process may take half an hour, and you need to recompile after the system is updated! After Android N, in order to reduce application space occupation and improve installation efficiency, dex is no longer fully compiled when applications are installed, resulting in a decrease in running speed. Selecting "compile" through this function will use speed mode to compile when installing the application, the installation speed is significantly slower, but the runtime is smoother (increased by about 20%, no increase in game frame rate!). 

Take the Douyu TV client under the Oreo system as an example. The base.odex was only 6.8MB when it was newly installed, and it was increased to 103MB after compilation. 

However, many domestic applications use hot update technology, and they often need to download the latest code from the server and parse and render during operation. This is the main reason for the slow startup of these applications or the stalling after startup. Therefore, dex2oat compilation cannot bring significant performance improvement for such applications! https://source.android.com/devices/tech/dalvik/jit-compiler?hl=zh-cn Apply and install dex2oat strategy Applicable to Android N+, adjust the dex2oat compilation strategy when the PackageManager application is installed, and need to be reset after updating the system View saved WIFI Parse wpa_supplicant.conf or WifiConfigStore.xml in the /data/misc/wifi directory Performance Boost Config streamlined Turn off some options in Performance Boost Config to avoid the CPU being frequently pulled up and cause power consumption, but keeping the application startup and upscaling will slightly reduce the experience. Need to restart! continue
All loopback devices have been occupied and cannot be mounted! SWAP is being closed, this may be slow Current status: Memory Info VM Stat SWAP IO Note:
The higher the value, the more active SWAP will be used. The impact of this setting on fluency is difficult to perceive, so adjust as appropriate~ Swappiness ZRAM adjust Description: ZRAM is an implementation of SWAP. When the available memory becomes insufficient, part of the data in the memory will be compressed. But the CPU will become busy~ Compression algorithm The changes did not take effect ZRAM is in use, and the compression algorithm cannot be changed now. 

To make the settings take effect, please click the "Adjust" button below Swapfile create start up closure delete Use ZRAM again Simultaneous use with ZRAM Prior to use of ZRAM Mount as a loopback device If SWAP can be used normally without turning on this option, there is no need to turn it on. 

Unless SWAP cannot be started, or the phone freezes after starting SWAP, you only need to enable this option! 

For example: Xiaomi's SDM845 model is on Android 9.0, you need to check this option to use SWAP normally Note: Swapfile is similar to the virtual memory of Windows, and the exchange efficiency is limited by the disk performance. Do not use this function on a mobile phone with a small capacity or insufficient space to prevent the flash memory from aging too quickly! Auto-start at boot (to allow Scene to start automatically) Note: You need to allow Scene to start automatically, and it will take effect next time you start it! ZRAM status External add-on (Magisk) module You have installed the Magisk framework. It is recommended to use the latest version of the add-on module to enhance the reliability of SWAP control. The main functions of the add-on are as follows: 1. Improve the speed of restoring ZRAM and Swapfile settings after the phone restarts 2. Adjust the LMK parameters according to the device RAM capacity to strengthen the background retention capacity 3. Adjust VM parameters to improve the enthusiasm for using ZRAM and Swapfile After downloading the module, please flash it in Magisk Manager by yourself and restart your phone! The compression ratio of ZRAM is usually between 20~45% Data compression algorithm: %s
Original data size: %s
Compressed size: %s
Physical memory usage: %s
Maximum memory usage: %s
Memory usage limit: %s
compression Rate: %s Data compression algorithm: %s
original data size: %s
compressed size: %s
compression rate : %s ZRAM Writeback
Writeback block: %s
Written back: %dMB
Total read: %dMB
Total writeback: %dMB Compression algorithm Not created not initiated Using extra_free_kbytes(KB) This value specifies how much physical memory the Linux kernel will reserve. When the memory is insufficient, it will immediately begin to compress the memory to SWAP/ZRAM. The device will obviously become slower before the available memory rises to a reasonable range.

Simply put the extra_free_kbytes setting more Larger, the more aggressive the memory recovery (swap or kill process), but it is not recommended to set too large, so as not to waste physical memory and increase the burden on the disk/processor! watermark_scale_factor The value range is 0~1000, where 1000 means 10%, which means that the difference between the three values ​​of the memory water level line low/min/high (physical RAM capacity) is 10%. 

For example (my phone):
pageSize=4KB
managed=1951743(pages)
min_free_kbytes=10900(KB)
watermark_scale_factor=500

The min value is
10900(KB)/4( PageSize)=2725(pages)
low value is approximately
1951743*5%+2725≈100312(pages)
high value is approximately
1951743*10%+2725≈197899(pages)
Note: the final low, high The value may be too large due to extra_free_kbytes.

In this example,
min=2725=10MB
low=100312≈392MB
high=197899≈773MB

means that the memory will start to be recycled if it is less than 392M RAM, until the available RAM is higher than 773MB~

Risk statement Scene is an application for machine enthusiasts. To use it, you need to have excellent eyesight, reading comprehension and a good attitude. 

Unforeseen errors may occur during use, resulting in data loss and even failure to boot normally. 
Please be sure not to use it on your mobile phone [for work] or [important data], so as not to cause loss! 

According to the user’s past feedback, using this software on the following manufacturers’ models may lose data or even fail to boot:
Meizu, LG, Google Pixel

During use, please read the prompts carefully and operate carefully , Don’t easily toggle the function option that you don’t understand! 

In addition, the author of this application does not guarantee that help and troubleshooting suggestions will be provided! Please authorize the display of floating window permissions for Scene first! Let Scene automatically adjust the LMK parameters according to your RAM capacity, thereby enhancing the background capabilities (may lead to stuttering when the memory is low). If you need to restore, please turn off this option and restart your phone. If you need to set it automatically after booting, please allow the toolbox to start Low memory optimization Low Memory Killer Scene integrated Busybox does not support your current system, please download and install Busybox yourself You cannot use this function without obtaining ROOT permission dex2oat compilation completed dex2oat is compiling dex2oat resetting
Shortcut is missing For the following apps that have been added to the bias mode, the startup shortcut has been lost or was not created successfully. Do you want to recreate it immediately? Frozen apps × Defrosted application √ Created Creation failed Add shortcuts in bulk Adding shortcuts in batches may fail, you can long press the application icon to send a single shortcut to the desktop! √ The icon display status has been switched You may need to manually delete the added shortcuts! Need "read and write local storage" permission to use system wallpaper as software background

Most of the modification operations of Scene to the system can now be carried out in the form of Magisk modules. However, you must first agree that Scene will automatically install additional modules on your phone and restart the phone (recommended)! Click the menu in the upper right corner to select and edit the temperature control file. After editing, click Save~

Note: With the continuous update of the Android system, it becomes more and more difficult to modify the system partition, and the modification may not be saved successfully, or It will be automatically restored after restarting. It is recommended to use the magisk module to complete the temperature control modification! 

The temperature control file is generally in the /system/etc or /vendor/etc directory, the name starts with "thermal" and the suffix is ".conf" The process manager is not compatible with your phone yet!
